import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-welcome', templateUrl: './welcome.component.html', styleUrls: ['./welcome.component.css'] }) export class WelcomeComponent { @Input('isLoggedIn') isLoggedIn: boolean = false; }

Welcome!

SoftUni forum is a place, where you can post your questions, comment, and discuss problems, which you have in your programming language or in your study in SoftUni.
